description:
A basic 101 introduction to Business Math.

Includes:

Introduction,
Percentage and Average,
Fractions and Decimals,
Exponents,Profit and Loss,
Measurement and Conversions,
Series and Sequences,
Probability,
Permutations and Combinations,
Roots and Radicals,
Measures of Central Tendency,
Variance and Standard Deviation,
Ratio and Proportion,
Variables and Word Problems,
Insurance,
Markup,
Discount,
Inventory,
Mortgage,
Stocks and Bonds,
Taxes,
Simple Interest,
Compound Interest,
Commission and Payroll,
Depreciation,
Geometry,
Charts and Graphs,
Graphing Linear Equations,
Slope and Equation of a line,
Polynomials,
Trigonometry.

Also added search feature.


Please write to us. We would love to improve this app
